PasswordRecovery.recover_explanation: A password recovery email will be sent to the registered account

setupSteps.welcomeText: We are glad you found us. After a small Setup you can start leveraging your business!
setupSteps.finalText: You have managed to add your printer. Now you can track and analyse your production.

ScanDevicesOnNetwork.title: Add your 3D Printer
ScanDevicesOnNetwork.explanation: Search for your printer on the network or add him manually:
ScanDevicesOnNetwork.search: We search for your Device in the Network
ScanDevicesOnNetwork.not_found:
We could not find any printer on the network. This is often caused by an older software version on the printer or your network settings.
Please make sure the printer is connected or add the printer manually.

Chat.reply: Hmm unfortunately is this chat not build yet. We are working on it, we promise!

AddDeviceSteps.no_device: No devices found! Please make sure they are connected to the internet and try again or use the manual option.
AddDeviceSteps.use_interface_for_multi: should be used for the following device:
AddDeviceSteps.use_interface_for_single: will be used for this device:

DeviceManual.ip_wrong: The IP address is written wrong - check again
DeviceManual.error: It is not possible to register the device! Please check the IP address again.
